scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run copy-assets-plain && parcel build index.html --experimental-scope-hoisting --no-minify
scripts.build:prod: rm -rf docs/* && npm run copy-assets-plain && && cross-env NODE_ENV=production LOCAL_DEV=false parcel build index.html --no-source-maps -t browser -d docs  --no-minify --no-content-hash --public-url ./ && cp CNAME docs && cp -r assets/* docs/
scripts.acp: git add . && git commit -m "x" --allow-empty && git push -u
scripts.deploy: npm run build:prod && npm run acp
